About

Hello!

We are Burrd, a group of ten students from UC San Diego making a bold foray into the world of mobile app development. Burrd began as a project for our Software Engineering course. We sought to create an app that would enable students to find the best value for food and drinks in their local area.

Our team consists of Brenton Ang, Sherman Cheung, Adam Dorwat, Xu(Ken) He, Soham Jatakia, Chloe Lopez, David Liberman, Trent Miller, Anjali Patel, and Andrew Walters. We are very proud to bring you this app and wish you the best of luck in your gastronomic endeavors. Happy Happy Hour!

Burrd is a fusion between blurred and bird. Why? Because the BIRD is the WORD.\n\nThe Burrd is inspired by our lead software developer’s beloved Cockatiel who has an affinity for fine beers. We are a group of thrifty college students from UC San Diego who are always on the prowl for the best deals to get us drunk or full for as little money as possible.
Hide Pic
Andrew, Project Manager\nOur fearless leader. When he isn’t drinking beers, he’s roasting ribs, and occasionally, tri-tip.
Adam, Software Architect\nFormer Microsoft intern, has the midas touch of turning garbage into industry-grade code.
Trent, Lead Developer\nSee him slinging code while shredding gnar on the Pacific Coast.
Soham, Lead Developer\nMakes apps for doctors. Also the reigning champion of IBPL, The Indian Beer Pong League.
Chloe, UI Extraordinaire\nBecause of her wondrous portfolio, some confuse her as the creator of the DragonBall series.
Sherman, Algorithms Man\nReigning from San Francisco, he makes sure that the deal finds you and you find the deal.
David, BizNiz/Systems\nFormer DraftKings intern. David is looking to innovate, ladies. Holla.
Anjali, Quality Assurance\nSpecial power: she can sniff out the bugs in the cleanest of code.
Ken, Database Guru\nKnown as the Atomic Bomb, he is the secret weapon.
Brenton, Database Guru\nDallas Mavericks. Dallas Mavericks. Dallas Mavericks. Dallas Mavericks.
